definition: Jiang Shiquan (1725-1784), Qing poet, one of Three great poets of the Qianlong era 乾嘉三大家
surname Jiang/refers to Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

sentences.english: The thesis makes a comparative analysis of the two masters in opera creation.
sentences.chinese: 本文比較分析了唐英與蔣士銓戲曲創作的異同。
